text: The year 2007 in science had some important events, listed below. == Events == * March 3 - A total lunar eclipse happened that could be seen in some parts of America and Asia, and in all of Europe and Africa. * March 19 - A partial solar eclipse happened that could be seen in Asia. * April 25 - The planet Gliese 581 c was found. * August 28 - A total lunar eclipse happened that could be seen in some parts of America and Asia, and all of Australasia and the Pacific Ocean. * September 27 - NASA's spacecraft Dawn is launched. == Deaths == * July 23 - Ernst Otto Fischer Category:2007 Category:Years in science
title: 2007 in science
